author: andreas
content:
It's pretty much the same for me. Actually, if I consider my own patterns of consuming internet content, I'm surprised - and glad - that anybody comes visiting at all ðŸ™‚

As to the by-line, well, I guess I'll keep it for now. Writing on the train in advance works for me at the moment, and up to to day I still have material for roughly 150 posts in the pipeline. In late June I'll be in southern France, that should also give me a healthy refill ðŸ˜„
